function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced access to antenatal care services leading to increased risk of undernutrition in mothers and children","Impact":"Dramatically increased undernutrition and health risks for mothers and children","Mitigation":"Increase access to and provision of antenatal care services, provide nutritional support, and implement public health education programs","Technologies":"Telehealth services, mobile health apps, and remote monitoring devices","People":"Mothers, children, and communities in low-resource settings","Owner":"Healthcare providers, public health organizations, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Enforced confinement leading to 7 million unintended births in poorest countries","Impact":"Increased unintended births and strained healthcare and social support systems","Mitigation":"Increase access to family planning services, provide reproductive health education, and support community-based contraception distribution","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile health clinics, and community health worker apps","People":"Families in poorest countries and healthcare providers","Owner":"UNFPA, healthcare providers, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Interrupted education and inequities in learning access exacerbation","Impact":"Disrupted education and increased inequities in access to learning","Mitigation":"Promote accessible and inclusive remote learning options, provide digital literacy support, and support community-based learning initiatives","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, digital educational resources, and community learning centers","People":"Children, adults, and communities in low- and middle-income countries","Owner":"Educational institutions, government agencies, and community organizations"}]}
